activities:
KISSmetrics is a web analytics tool that allows online businesses to understand how their visitors and customers are interacting with their websites.
		
KISSmetrics receives personal information regarding natural persons located in the EEA and/or Switzerland ("EEA Data Subjects") in order to provide online products and services, such as its analytics tool.  Any personal data collected from EEA Data Subjects is used by our customers in order to improve the experience for their visitors.  KISSmetrics customers are responsible for ensuring that their use of the KISSmetrics analytics tool, including any collection of personal information, complies with all applicable laws and regulations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
